br.octahedron.util.reflect
Class InstanceHandler<T>

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.util.reflect.InstanceHandler<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The handled type.
public class InstanceHandler<T>
extends Object

An instance handler for instances of a type. It's responsible by assure that only an instance of a given type is used. An instance is retrieved given the object's Class. When a new instance is created, the method createdInstance(Object) is invoked, thus is possible, if necessary, overwrite this method to perform some operation over the brand new object.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

getInstance

public final T getInstance(Class<? extends T> klass)

Parameters:

Returns:

createdInstance

protected void createdInstance(T instance)
This method is called when a new T instance is created. It can be used to perform some operation over the new instance. The default implementation do nothing.

Parameters:
instance - The brand new instance.
